name: TheBeautyofSTEM
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A Byte of Style is a weekly review of fashions integrated with technology that Shimira Williams co-creates with makers. Over the past five years, Williams has been partnering with makers in the City of Pittsburgh to work with youth to co-create fashions embed technology through an initiative The Beauty of S.T.E.M. (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics). 

Williams created The Beauty of S.T.E.M. while operating a home-based child care facility. A youth's desire for different programming, sparked the idea to interview fashion and beauty focused makers and entrepreneurs. Then, support from our local library provided the opportunity to host a fashion show which ignited an idea for a summer maker studio series. Over the years of hosting the program, Williams learned the program was not about the fashion or technology but the community which it fosters amongst the participants. 

While shifting in her career, Williams also searched for a way to continue sharing her voice on technology and young children and building a community of youth makers. She decided to continue the conversation digitally at https://www.thebeautyofstem.com, whose RSS feed is the source of this Flash Briefing. 

The website content while consist:
- Prototypes of clothing integrated with technology, that Shimira Williams has created only or co-created with makers (youth and adults). 
- Interviews of health, beauty, and hair makers to expose youth to inventors and creators of products and service. 
- Zoey's Zone | Zoey is a fictional character that relocated to live with her aunt after her family experienced a series of tragedies. Zoey is represented by Healthy Roots Doll to promote self-esteem about natural hair for young African-American girls. Williams tells stories to encourage play and making activities that support early S.T.E.M. and media literacy. 

Enable The Beauty of S.T.E.M.) skill to receive our updates in your flash briefing on Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
